title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.261 - Valuation account (or reserve)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.261 - Valuation account (or reserve)

State Regulations

An account which relates to and partly or wholly offsets
one or more other accounts; as, accumulated depreciation or allowance for bad
debts; unamortized debt discount. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.261

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
